description: Overview dashboard for HOST from telegraf and InfluxDB metrics

targets.query: SELECT mean("load1")/last("n_cpus") FROM "system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s), "host"
SELECT mean("load5")/last("n_cpus") FROM "system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s), "host"
SELECT mean("load5")/last("n_cpus") FROM "system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s), "host"
SELECT mean("load5")/last("n_cpus") FROM "system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s), "host"
SELECT last("uptime_format") AS "value" FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(3h)
SELECT mean("n_cpus") AS "mean_n_cpus" FROM "system"  WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("usage_idle") * -1 + 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "path" = '/') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("load5") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("total_threads") FROM "processes" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "swap" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SELECT "host" FROM (SELECT last("uptime") AS "mean_uptime" FROM "telegraf"."default_policy"."system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")
list.label: Server
list.name: server
list.query: SELECT "host" FROM (SELECT last("uptime") AS "mean_uptime" FROM "telegraf"."default_policy"."system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY "host")

title: asdfasdf
